room_title: Escape room "Taken Back" by Deciphered Roanoke in Roanoke
room_description:
No more than a few days had passed since stealing whatever supplies you could from the well house you stumbled upon when it became evident that someone was on your heels. One morning, you wake up to discover that your wagon full of supplies and one of your companions has gone missing. The rest of your team sets out to try and track down the supplies, but more importantly, your friend.
After spending the day rummaging through every building you could access, you find your group member locked away in the cellar of an old abandoned house. When you enter the room they tell you that their captor will return, soon. Can your team save your friend, retake your supplies, and escape before the man returns?
